deploy.commandDescription:
deploy a Salesforce project
Deploy a project, including org metadata and functions. Be default, the deploy analyze your project and assume sensible defaults when possible, otherwise it will prompt. To always prompt and not assume defaults, use "--interctive".
To run specialized deploys, especially when interactivity isn't an option like continuous deployment, used the scoped deploy commands like "sf project deploy org" or "sf project deploy functions"
